lead_paragraph: NASSO--Theresa (nee Basile) July 4, 1913 - March 20, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Vincent. Devoted mother of Norma and her husband Donald Deraska. Loving Nonna of Diane Deraska Malinowski and Donald Deraska, M.D. Adored great-grandmother of Donald, Peter, Julia, Remi Elizabeth, Remi Emanuelle and Richard Ettienne. Reposing Scarpaci Funeral Home, 1401-86th St., Brooklyn, NY. Tuesday 2-5 and 7-9 until Wednesday 10am. Mass St. Frances de Chantal, 10:30am. www.scarpaci.biz 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  NASSO, THERESA (NEE BASILE) JULY 4
